    • Class nowhere2gopp.gamelogic.GameBoard extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • gameboardSize

          int gameboardSize
          Size of the Gameboard.

        • k

          int k
          Integer value that decides the size of the Gameboard and the count of the rounds of the Frist gamephase .

        • rounds

          int rounds
          Count of the elapsed rounds.

        • PhaseOneRounds

          int PhaseOneRounds
          Stores the amount of rounds that the first Gamephase has.

        • boardViewer

          Viewer boardViewer
          Viewer of this Gameboard

        • blueAgent

          Site blueAgent
          Indicates the current Position of the Blue Agent.

        • redAgent

          Site redAgent
          Indicates the current Position of the Red Agent.

        • status

          Status status
          Stores the current Status of the Gameboard

        • currentTurn

          PlayerColor currentTurn
          Stores the PlayerColor whose Turn it is.

        • currentPhase

          GamePhase currentPhase
          Stores the Gamephase that the current game is at.

        • sites

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> sites
          Map of the Nodes that store the Site.

        • links

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> links
          Map of the Links.

        • possibleMoves

          java.util.EnumMap<K extends java.lang.Enum<K>,V> possibleMoves
          Map of the possible Moves of Phase One.

        • redPossibleMoves

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> redPossibleMoves
          Map of the possible Moves of Red in Gamephase two and three.

        • bluePossibleMoves

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> bluePossibleMoves
          Map of the possible Moves of Blue in Gamephase two and three.

        • surrender

          Move surrender
          move of MoveType surrender
